locations.name: Florence
locations.description: The starting point of the tour, renowned as the cradle of the Renaissance, famous for its art, architecture, and historical significance.

locations.name: Chianti Region
locations.description: The heart of the trip, characterized by rolling hills, vineyards, olive groves, and rustic accommodations like farmhouses or villas. Known for Chianti Classico wine. (Coordinates are approximate, representing a central point like Greve in Chianti).

locations.name: Siena
locations.description: The concluding city of the retreat, a stunning medieval Gothic city famous for the Piazza del Campo and the Palio horse race.
